Detailed Description

Administration functions for locale.module.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum LOCALE_IMPORT_KEEP

Translation import mode keeping existing translations and only inserting new strings.

enum LOCALE_IMPORT_OVERWRITE

Translation import mode overwriting all existing translations if new translated version available.

Function Documentation

_locale_parse_js_file ( $  filepath  ) 

End of "locale-api-import" Parses a JavaScript file, extracts strings wrapped in Drupal.t() and Drupal.formatPlural() and inserts them into the database.
